'''1.7.10 Build 18'''<ref>{{link |url=http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog|title=MinecraftEdu Changelog|date=|website=|author=}}([https://web.archive.org/web/20170207182304/http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog Archive])</ref> is the eighteenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on April 24, 2015. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Additions ==
* ComputerCraftEdu integration to teacher menu. This will only be available if new enough CCEdu is installed.

== Changes ==
* Removed gender selecting completely. 

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Single player crashing when running a command.
